properties.title: Welcome to the Custom Space User Management project

section.name: Welcome to the Custom Space User Management project

body.section:
Introduction Welcome to the C.S.U.M. Confluence plugin project maven documentation. This contains technical details about the plugin project itself for those interested. You are probably more interested in the main project page. Rajendra also took a really great team picture if you're interested in seeing our ugly mugs.
Description This plugin gives Space Administrators ability to manage users and user-groups associated to their Wiki Spaces.
Bugs/Issues Current bugs/issues can be found and new ones reported through the main Atlassian Developer JIRA SUSR project.
